thread.title: Shahid Kapoor’s baby Misha’s first pic; Harshvardhan Kapoor and Jacqueline Fernandes’ HOT mag cover: Take a look at Bolly Insta this week
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor’s baby Misha’s first pic; Harshvardhan Kapoor and Jacqueline Fernandes’ HOT mag cover: Take a look at Bolly Insta this week

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Shahid Kapoor’s baby Misha’s first pic; Harshvardhan Kapoor and Jacqueline Fernandes’ HOT mag cover: Take a look at Bolly Insta this week
text:
Shraddha Kapoor as Haseena Parkar looks fierce and bold in the first look of Haseena: The Queen of Mumbai – view pic 
We are back with the best Insta posts this week. With Harshvardhan Kapoor and Jacqueline Fernandes raising up the heat on a magazine cover to Shahid Kapoor’s little baby girl Misha making her Instagram debut; Bollywood celebs have been treating us with some mind-blowing pictures in the last week. So without wasting much time, let’s take a look at who make it to Bolly Insta this week. 
Shahid Kapoor A photo posted by Shahid Kapoor (@shahidkapoor) on Feb 8, 2017 at 12:37am PST 
Shahid definitely tops the list this week simply because he shared Misha’s first ever pic on social media! And this cutie has our hearts.. I mean, look at her pic, how adorable is she! Shahid was recently asked at an event when exactly would the world get to see Misha and he said that he was “waiting for a special occassion” to do it. And immediately on the next day, he shared Misha’s pic with Mira holding her in her arms.. Whattay pleasant surprise it was and within no time, the pic became the hot topic of the day. So, here’s hoping to see more of Misha Kapoor henceforth. 
Harshvardhan Kapoor 
A photo posted by Harshvardhan Kapoor (@harshvardhankapoor) on Feb 6, 2017 at 7:15am PST A photo posted by Harshvardhan Kapoor (@harshvardhankapoor) on Feb 9, 2017 at 4:57am PST 
Harshvardhan and Jacqueline came together for a mag cover and they have KILLED it with their super hot chemistry in these pictures. Both of them have been sharing pics and videos from behind the scenes and all we gotta say is they are too hot to handle! Check out their pics. 
Shraddha Kapoor 
A photo posted by Shraddha ~ (@shraddhakapoor) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:11pm PST 
Shraddha is next gonna be seen in Haseena and what coould be a better platform than to introduce her film’s poster on social media? She looks fierce and fiesty on the first poster of Haseena. Don’t you agree? 
Varun Dhawan A photo posted by Varun Dhawan (@varundvn) on Feb 8, 2017 at 4:03am PST 
Varun and Alia have both started their promotions for Badrinath Ki Dulhania, their next movie together. The actor took to Insta to share his a.k.a Badrinath’s biodata and it has got us in splits! 
Sonakshi Sinha 
A photo posted by Sonakshi Sinha (@aslisona) on Feb 7, 2017 at 3:09am PST A photo posted by Sonakshi Sinha (@aslisona) on Feb 7, 2017 at 7:17pm PST 
Sonakshi is holidaying in Maldives again and here we are getting all envious seeing her vacation pictures…No, I mean it! Just one look at these pics and I bet you’d want to pack your bags and head out on a vacation yourself! 
So that’s all for this week. We shall be back next week with the best Insta posts.. Till then stay tuned.
